'''Minecraft x Dragon Ball Z Tease''' is a special trailer released during [[Minecraft LIVE â€“ September 2025]], announcing the [[Dragon Ball Z]] collaboration.

== Summary ==
Climbing up a [[mountain]], [[Efe]] discovers six of the seven [https://dragonball.fandom.com/wiki/Dragon_Ball_(object) dragon balls], illuminating a bright light. Placing down the four-star ball, Efe successfully summons [https://dragonball.fandom.com/wiki/Shenron Shenron] into the [[Overworld]]. Efe proceeds to ask an inaudible wish, which Shenron happily grants, first turning Efe into a [https://dragonball.fandom.com/wiki/Super_Saiyan super saiyan], before being replaced with {{Wikipedia|Goku}}. After taking a look at himself, several of the other [https://dragonball.fandom.com/wiki/Z_Fighters Z Fighters] appear.
